titles.title: Let Us Search And Try Our Ways

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let us search and try our ways
And turn again to the Lord,
Let us lift up our hearts with our hands;
Let us lift up our hearts unto God in the heavens,
Let us turn again to the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It is of the Lord's mercies that we're not consumed,
Because His compassions fail not;
They are new like the dew every day that we live,
Father, great is Thy faithfulness.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
It is good for a man that he bear his yoke,
That he bear his yoke in his youth;
It is good for a man to both hope and wait
For the salvation of God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The Lord is my portion saith my soul,
Therefore will I hope in Him;
The Lord is good to them that wait for Him,
To the soul that seeketh Him.
